snippet: An independent panel voted today to restore two California bases to a list of military installations being considered for closing.   In a 7-to-0 vote, the Defense Base Closure and Realignment Commission decided to add McClellan Air Force Base near...
lead_paragraph: An independent panel voted today to restore two California bases to a list of military installations being considered for closing. In a 7-to-0 vote, the Defense Base Closure and Realignment Commission decided to add McClellan Air Force Base near Sacramento and the Defense Language Institute in Monterey to the 31 bases already on the Pentagon's latest base-closing list.

headline.main: 2 Bases in California Return to Closing List
